participant_1.background:
My father drove a car for nascar.
My favorite color is grey.
I have a german shepherd named barnaby.
I am terrified of scorpions.
I am employed by the us postal service.

participant_2.background:
I love dogs.
I live in alabama.
I like tacos.
I have one brother.
I have three sisters.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I love hanging out with my dogs and going for walks.
That sounds really fun. I love dogs too. What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a German Shepherd and a Golden Retriever.
Oh, those are both great breeds! I have a German Shepherd named Barnaby.
That's a great name! I love German Shepherds. They're so smart and loyal.
They are! Barnaby is my best friend.
I bet he is. I love dogs so much. They're always so happy to see me.
They are! I love that about them.
I like to go for walks with my dogs in the park. It's so relaxing.
I agree. I love taking Barnaby to the park. He loves to run around and play.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I wish I could go for a walk with my dogs right now.
You should! It would be a great way to relax and spend time with your dogs.
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to help.
